Financial Reporting

You will learn how to apply accounting standards, theoretical frameworks and principles to a range of financial statements including a statement of financial position and a statement of cash flow which conforms with international accounting standards. You will also explore the application of financial statements interpretation, group accounts preparation through case studies.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+   Understand and critically evaluate the role of the conceptual framework for financial reporting.

+  Understand and critically evaluate the role of the international regulatory framework for financial reporting.

+  Prepare, present and analyse financial statements which conform with international accounting standards.

+   Prepare and present accounts for business combinations in accordance with international accounting standards.
